video_prompt: Explosions flash and laser fire streaks across deep space. Spaceships maneuver, engines glowing, as a massive energy column pulsates and expands, shattering crystalline debris. Tentacled alien craft react amidst the chaos. Human figures brace on a vast metallic structure as light flares and shadows shift dramatically, emphasizing the intense, dynamic battle.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** High-detail vibrant futuristic space battle: chaotic yet controlled, central action focus. Dominated by deep blues/purples and bright orange/red from a large star. Intense central energy surge with light blue laser fire streaks. Numerous diverse spacecraft, some emitting blue light. Large battleships with intricate metallic structures and glowing turrets. Floating crystalline shards, especially around a massive vertical energy column resembling a warp drive, emitting intense white/light blue light with rainbow streaks and shattering effects. Large tentacled alien-like spacecraft near the column. Foreground features a sprawling dark metallic superstructure with human figures in futuristic armor. Dramatic lighting, strong light/shadow contrasts, epic deep space confrontation.
refined_video_prompt: Explosions flash, laser fire streaks. Spaceships actively maneuver, engines flaring as a colossal energy column pulsates, expanding to shatter crystalline debris. Tentacled alien craft writhe, reacting amidst the chaos. Human figures brace, expressions straining as intense light flares and shadows dramatically shift.
